Text: Despite this being the one of the only "girl" books of the new DC, I just haven't been able to get into it.  Batwoman is way better, and even Voodoo and Batgirl top this.  Maybe it's just me though.  Or maybe it's Winick and March.  Shame though.  I really liked volume 2 (or is it 3?  Does the '89 miniseries count as a volume?).
